## Checklist

- [ ] The functionality meets the related user story or issue
- [ ] I have added at least two reviewers, with one of them being from another team
- [ ] I have written or updated tests related to this change
- [ ] I have updated the documentation related to this change (if applicable)
- [ ] I have followed the [coding standards of this project](https://erasmusegalitarian.github.io/educado-docs/handbook/mobile/standards/)
- [ ] I have followed the [workflow of this project](https://erasmusegalitarian.github.io/educado-docs/handbook/mobile/workflow/)
- [ ] I have built the code locally and tested that it works
  - [ ] My changes are not breaking existing functionality
- I am keeping track of other PRs and ensuring that:
  - [ ] they are not blocking this PR
  - [ ] they are not blocked by this PR
  - [ ] this branch is kept updated by running `git fetch && git rebase origin/dev` whenever another PR is merged
- [ ] I will add the PR to the merge queue after it is approved
